duration_raw: until the end of your next turn
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 2" pfs="Standard">[Loose Time's Arrow](/Spells.aspx?ID=1185)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 182</row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** up to 6 creatures
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** until the end of your next turn
</row>

</column>

---

You pluck the time stream like a bow—pull one string back, release, and watch a creature fly. All affected targets are [quickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=32). They can use the extra action only to Step or Stride.
name: Loose Time's Arrow

</summary>
summary: Boost a group of creature's movement through time

text: Loose Time's Arrow Source Dark Archive pg. 182 Traditions Arcane, Occult, Primal Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Range 30 feet Target up to 6 creatures Duration until the end of your next turn --- You pluck the time stream like a bow—pull one string back, release, and watch a creature fly. All affected targets are quickened. They can use the extra action only to Step or Stride.
